author: @rohitk9954
text: Hey Alex !! I am a business analyst and i love doing more of management work than technical stuff !! How should i go forward ?

author: @collinschukwualuka8706
text: Do you run a bootcamp, i want to be a well trained analyst

author: @Mister_Garibaldi
text: I'm a hands-on Manager. Honestly, I have been frustrated with limitations I could not break through as an analyst, and even now I'm gunning for Senior Manager, partly because I am pretty sure I'll be able to break through more barriers. I'm still "building things", it's just more things and bigger things, and I'm not the only one doing the building.

author: @Goodluck_C
text: Hey Alex, can you do a video on how to think as a data analyst. More like what you should have in mind to help you analyze or become a good analyst. I don't know if I got the mindset but I really want to be a good data analyst.

author: @ankushstories-fight2win151
text: Hey Alex.. I want also switch my carrier to data analyst... Is there any option i can work with you... And learn things from you.. I can work saturday sunday for free remotely... Pls answer

author: @somaansa939
text: Same here. I prefer being more hands-on.   Would love to be a manager and still be hands-on.   Thanks for sharing.
